text_10: All products sold on KeyVault are digital keys. Upon successful payment via cryptocurrency, the key is delivered instantly to your registered email. Because these are digital goods,
text_12: are accepted once the key has been viewed.
text_14: We exclusively accept cryptocurrency payments. It is the user's responsibility to ensure the correct amount is sent including network fees. Underpaid invoices will not be processed automatically.
text_16: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and your wallet. KeyVault is not liable for any loss resulting from unauthorized access to your account.
